content:
The Magura V5 sea drones were destroyed by the Russian warship "Sergey Kotov". The ship was damaged by feed, right and left sides. According to GUR MOU, seven Russians were killed and six were wounded. The other 52 crew members were likely to be evacuated.

On the outskirts of Avdiivka, the fighters of the third separate assault brigade were captured by the Russian, who was "forced" to go to war.

In the occupied part of the Kherson region, the aerial forces impressed the enemy object by the AASM-250 Hammer-managed AASM-2550 Air barrel.

And the SBU detained the Russian agent who tried to undermine the post office in Zaporozhye.

These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - junior lieutenant Sergey Lipko and Lieutenant Colonel Sergei Misyura.
title: The ship was sank, the oil depots in Belgorod, the airbags in Kherson region: Star from the city in the east
description: On the outskirts of Avdiivka, the fighters of the third separate assault brigade were captured by the Russian, ...
author: Army Inform
